Instruction: Boil potatoes in salted water until tender. Drain and let cool.
Blanch green beans in boiling water for 2-3 minutes, then transfer to an ice bath to stop cooking. Drain and pat dry.
Hard boil eggs, then peel and quarter them.
Season tuna steaks with salt and pepper. Heat a skillet over medium-high heat and sear tuna for 1-2 minutes per side for medium-rare.
Chop lettuce into bite-sized pieces and arrange on a large serving platter.
Arrange sliced potatoes, green beans, cherry tomatoes, quartered eggs, olives, and tuna on top of the lettuce.
Drizzle with your favorite vinaigrette or dressing.
